issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

fields.summary: create a property to be able to toggle thin provisioning on/off (Equallogic)

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

issuetype.description: An improvement or enhancement to an existing feature or task.
issuetype.name: Improvement

fields.summary: Modifying EQL specific property <CLUSTER>.storage.eqlthinminreserve throws java.lang.ClassCastException

comments.body: [~swathi], could you have a look. This is probably a simple to fix and should be fixed in 4.3.
this issue can be closed as a dup, since the original ticket EUCA-11854 is now targeted for 4.3.1

Verified.
{code}
# euctl one.storage.eqlthinminreserve=20 --region admin@localhost
one.storage.eqlthinminreserve = 20

# euctl one.storage.eqlthinminreserve --region admin@localhost
one.storage.eqlthinminreserve = 20
